name: FLOOR IS MAGMA
description:
In this arcade game you play as 2 rival explorers who try to escape a rumbeling vulcano! Jump to escape the lava, dodge tumbeling boulders and use your whip to expose of your rival.

Orignaly this was a school project by Joren Cosemans (JorenC) and Wout Janssen (NekoChan). We had to design an arcade game for a custom arcade controller. We wanted to share the project with the world so we converted the controls to be playable with a keyboard. So don't forget to check out the controls below. Good luck and have fun! CONTROLS

START = Spacebar                   

BACK = Escape

BLUE PLAYER  

Movement = Q/A(left) & D(Right)

Jump = Z/W         

Whip = F        

YELLOW PLAYER 

Movement = LeftArrow & RightArrow

Jump = UpArrow          

Whip = RightCtrl        

INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS

1) Download the zip file. 

2) Unpack the zip file. 

3) Launch the .exe file.
